message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $200. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate you coming up. I could go down to $180, but I can't go any lower than that. It's really a great product, and I'm sure you'll get a lot of use out of it.
I understand that the product is great, but I'm still not comfortable paying $180. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer of $120, so I'll offer $140. Can you consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  How about we split the difference between our last offers and settle at $160? That's a very fair price for this product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $160 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $140, so I'll offer $130. Can you consider that?
